text: 7|156|melum, ‘‘(iraivane!) Im'maiyil ni enkalukku nanmaiyai mutivu ceyvayaka! (Avvare) marumaiyilum (ceyvayaka)! Niccayamaka nankal un pakkame munnokkinom'' (enrum pirarttittar). A(tarku irai)van ‘‘nan natiyavarkalai en vetanai vantataiyum. Eninum, en arutkotai anaittaiyumvita mika virivanatu. Akave, evarkal (enakkup) payantu jakattum kotuttu varukirarkalo avarkalukkum, evarkal nam vacanankalai nampikkai kolkirarkalo avarkalukkum (en arulai) nan mutivu ceyven'' enru kurinan
